article_title: McDonald's to buy back Israeli stores after boycott
sentence: Much  of  the  Gaza  Strip  has  been  devastated  during  the  Israeli  military  operations  that  began  after  Hamas-led  gunmen  attacked  southern  Israel  on  7  October,  killing  about  1,200  people  and  seizing  253  hostages.

article_title: McDonald's to buy back Israeli stores after boycott
sentence: About  130  of  the  hostages  remain  in  captivity,  at  least  34  of  whom  are  presumed  dead.

article_title: McDonald's to buy back Israeli stores after boycott
sentence: More  than  33,000  people  have  been  killed  in  Gaza  since  then,  the  territory's  Hamas-run  health  ministry  said.
